item.name: NYU Abu Dhabi
item.description: As a student at NYUAD, NYU's new **honors college** in the Middle East, I study a **liberal arts** curriculum, concentrating in computer science, economics, and political science. As the chair of the student government's **research & development committee**, I develop technical solutions for students, including an **OAuth**-based student directory written in **Node.js** and deployed on **Heroku**.
